table.caption: Treasure Drops
rows: None
A crude map drawn on a scrap of tanned dinosaur hide, showing a route to Port Nyanzaru and the location of a randomly determined landmark or lair (250 gp)
{@dice 1d4} gemstones (10 gp each) in a small pouch
A malachite ring inlaid with electrum (50 gp)
An empty corked vial made from an aarakocra's engraved wing bone (5 gp)
A rotting quiver containing {@dice 1d10} {@item Silvered Arrow|PHB|silvered arrows}
A gold nugget the size of a dwarf's fist (50 gp)
A stoppered vial of {@item Serpent Venom}
An engraved ivory smoking pipe (25 gp)
Case containing {@dice 2d12} {@item Insect Repellent (block of incense)|ToA|blocks of insect repellent incense}
An iron token bearing the symbol of a triceratops (the sign of the Ytepka Society), worth 50 gp in Port Nyanzaru
{@item Potion of Animal Friendship}
{@item Potion of Vitality}
{@item Spell scroll (1st Level)}
A stoppered vial of {@item Wyvern poison}
An obsidian knife (25 gp)
A stoppered, wooden tube containing {@dice 1d4} gemstones (50 gp each)
A small onyx orb with maze-like patterns carved into its surface (75 gp), usable as an {@item Arcane Focus|PHB|arcane} or {@item druidic focus|PHB}
A Batiri goblin mask made of painted wood, set with nine gemstones (10 gp each)
A {@item spyglass|PHB} (1,000 gp)
A {@item lute|PHB} (35 gp) with one broken string
A set of {@item thieves' tools|PHB} (25 gp)
An excellent {@item lock|PHB} (50 gp) that requires a successful {@dc 20} Dexterity check to pick using {@item thieves' tools|PHB} (the lock's key is missing)
Jar of {@item Keoghtom's ointment}
{@item Horn of blasting}
{@item Wand of secrets}
table.name: Cyclops; Treasure Drops
